map.string: Should group moderator chat be displayed in bold
Make avatar stand up when camera is reset to 3rd Person View
For friends list names. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name)
For lists of group members names. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name)
For names in chat tabs. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name)
For names land management lists. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name)
For name on lookat crosshairs. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name), less than 0 for off
For general purpose names in the viewer. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name)
For names in the radar. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name)
For names in lists of speakers. 0 = Old Style, 1 = Display Names and Username, 2 = Displayname only, 3 = Old Style (Display Name)
If false, disconnect from neighboring regions and all further neighbors on teleport
Render a line from Look At beacon to the originating avatar
Shake the screen when the region restart floater is displayed
User is a bad enough dude.
Allowed client to update client definitions file.
Auto-close OOC chat (i.e. add "))" if not found and "((" was used)
Allow MU* pose style in chat and IM (with ':' as a synonymous to '/me ')
Toggles whether to save certain settings per-account, rather than per-install.
This separates data bits from each other - May be used in multiple locations
Show your own tagcolor to yourself(instead of default linden viewer color).
Always rez under the owned land group
Show special colors for statuses like Friend, Linden, so on
Show idle time of others in tags.
Show avatar names in the color of their client.
Show build option regardless of whether you can (May not mean you can actually build there)
Always allow fly (Does actually always allow flight)
Shows large changes to the sim script count in chat.
The delta to spam you the script jump difference
Center selection on parent prim's center.
Pivot points are based on percentages
Pivot point on X-axis for new objects
Pivot point on Y-axis for new objects
Pivot point on Z-axis for new objects
Would you like the chatbar to be able to be used for command line functions?
Clear chat history to stop lag from chat spam
How wide the rezzed platform will appear to be.
Teleport to a region by name rapidly
Attempt to arrive in the same location you were at.
Use a fast key to name query
Offer a teleport to target avatar
Teleport to a person by name, partials work.
Command prefix for chat to say to entire region, if allowed(EM).
Open SLURLS and URLs from chatbar.
Use the complete name "Display Name (legacy.name)" in profiles, instead of following the choice set by PhoenixNameSystem.
Amount of time (in seconds) over which uploaded bvh animation blends in by default.
Amount of time (in seconds) over which uploaded bvh animation blends out by default.
Allow camera to reset when moving.
Always use web profiles floaters instead of legacy profile floaters.
Always use web-based search instead of legacy search.
When clicking search SLURLs, or using an SLapp that uses these, display the web-based search (When false, some search SLURLs may display somewhat improperly).
Color setting of circle for rollovers on the minimap.
Color setting for rollovers on the minimap.
Radius of the area of affect for the minimap, adjusted by shift scrolling over the minimap.
Show a notification when exporting to OBJ fails (both partially and completely)
Show a notification when exporting to OBJ succeeds
OBJ Files saved swap Y and Z axes (useful for Cinema 4D users)
Overlay page to display on the login splash string. Leave empty if you want unmodified grid splash page
Path to the overlay page to display on the login splash string. Leave empty if you want unmodified grid splash page
